[ARG0: President Trump] on Wednesday postponed this year 's Congressional picnic , [V: citing] [ARG1: the discussions over immigration policy and his administration 's practice of separating families at the border] .

President Trump on Wednesday postponed this year 's Congressional picnic , citing the discussions over immigration policy and his administration 's practice of [V: separating] [ARG1: families] [ARGM-LOC: at the border] .
